name: Ingredients (Modal Select)
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="ingredients"
	label="Select an Ingredient"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_ingredient"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=ingredients&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=ingredient.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=ingredient.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select a Ingredient"
	titleNew="New Ingredient"
	titleEdit="Edit Ingredient"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	required="true"
	class="input-large"
/>
